posts.post_content:
Hmm... At first, my thoughts were "I like [Garruk's Companion](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Garruk's Companion) better", but then I clued in that this could be easier to play than [Watchwolf](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Watchwolf), a card I thought was better than the Companion.  
  
It's kind of weird when commenters put things into perspective.

posts.post_content:
I find it odd that I have opened like 10 packs of 2014 and I got three of this guy, but not a single [Elvish Mystic](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Elvish Mystic).   
On the other hand I did get a certain archangel, paladin, and a foil reaver, so I am certainly not complaining.  
(And seeing how every other color now has a "bears" for two mana, usually with wild abilities stapled on, I think this card is just fine for green. Maybe even could have gotten GGG: Regenerate, which would have made it more solidly uncommon.)
posts.html:

On the other hand I did get a certain archangel, paladin, and a foil reaver, so I am certainly not complaining.
